Iretiola Doyle (nke a makwaara dị ka Iretiola Olusola Ayinke ) bụ onye Naijiria na- eme ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-egosi ihe TV, onye edemede na onye na-ekwu okwu ọha
A mụrụ Doyle na 3rd nke Mee, 1967 na Ondo Steeti mana ọ nọrọ na mmalite ya na ezinụlọ ya na Boston, United States
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na Naijiria, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Christ's Ado Ekiti wee nweta diploma na Mass Communication ma gụchaakwa na mahadum Jos na nzere na Theatre Arts
N'ime ọrụ gbagoro afọ iri abụọ na ụlọ ọrụ ntụrụndụ Naịjirịa, kredit ya kwụsịrị n'okirikiri na ngosi ihe onyonyo, ịse foto na ibipụta.
Iretiola Doyle bụ odee, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye ngosi

O weputara ma gosi ihe ngosi ejiji na ụdị ndụ nke ya akpọrọ "Oge With Iretiola"  ruo afọ iri na n'oge dị iche iche kwadoro ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onyonyo, dị ka "Morning Ride", "Taa On STV" na "Nimasa This Week na Channels TV"
Ọ bụ onye odee ma nwee ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ihuenyo n'ihi na Amaka Igwe Tempest (Oge 1) bụ otu n'ime ha.

Iretiola Doyle bụ onye na-akọwa mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya bụ onye dere ogidi dị iche iche n'oge dị iche iche; Shooting Breeze in city People, na n'ime ụlọ nkata dị na Gliteratti wepụrụ akwụkwọ akụkọ nke ụbọchị a na Tiola's Take na Satọdee Vanguard

A họpụtara ya otu ugboro na ngalaba ihe nkiri kacha mma na Reel Awards na 1998 maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri All About Ere na ugboro abụọ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ngalaba nkwado na AMAA Awards na 2007 na 2009 maka ọrụ ya na Sitanda na 2009

N'ofe Niger n'otu n'otu wee kpọpụta onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na onye ndu na GIAMA Awards na Houston Texas na 2013, yana onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na onye ndu na 2014 Nollywood Movie Awards maka ihe ngosi ya nke Ovo, na ihe egwu mmụọ Torn
Ihe omume a nyekwara ya onyinye nhọpụta ihe nrite nke Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Awards maka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kacha mma na 2015
Na nso nso a, a họpụtara ya na 2016 Africa Movie Academy Awards na udi omee kachasị mma na ọrụ ndu  maka ihe ngosi ya nke Dr
Elizabeth na Ebony Life Films' blockbuster 2015 hit; IRI ise
Iretiola Doyle's  CV tinyekwara onye ama ama The Arbitration   na The Wedding Party,   nke bụ ihe nkiri Naijiria kacha enweta ego na akụkọ ihe nkiri sinima Naijiria (dịka nke February 2017)
Ihe nkiri abụọ a gosipụtara na 2016 Toronto International Film Festival dị ka akụkụ nke obodo ruo n'isi obodo
Ndị ọzọ gụnyere Dinner na Madam President
Na telivishọn, o mepụtala ihe odide ndị na-agaghị echefu echefu na ihe ngosi dị ka Fuji House Of Commotion,  Dowry, na Gidi Up
Iretiola na-agba ugbu a dị ka enigmatic Sheila Ade-Williams na usoro telivishọn MNET Tinsel
Iretiola Doyle ga-eweghachi ọrụ ya dị ka Dr
Elizabeth na usoro ihe onyonyo iri ise na-abịa
Ekele ọkwa ọkwa ya kacha nso nso a gụnyere Vagina Monologues, Olorounbi The Musical and Nụrụ Okwu na Ndị Nwunye
Akọwapụtara dị ka 'onye na-eme ihe nkiri' site n'aka ndị ọgbọ ya, amaara ya maka ngosi egwuregwu zuru oke.
Ọ lụrụ Patrick Doyle ma nwee ụmụ isii
N'oge ngagharị iwe EndSars n'ofe mba ahụ mgbe e kwakọọrọ ụfọdụ ihe enyemaka, Ireti kwuru na Twitter ya na ọ bụ n'ihi agụụ
Ọ biputere “Amaara m na anyị bụ ndị a ma ama maka ịhụ awoof n'anya, mana anyaukwu abụghị ihe kpatara ọgbaghara ahụ na-ebelata ihe mgbu, ọ bụ agụụ
Oke agụụ
Nke ahụ bụ ihe ndị isi gị agaghị ebi ndụ
